name: Happy Miner (Sylphritz)
description:
A short game made for 20-Second Game Jam where you mine ore as much as possible within 20 seconds!

Controls
  • Movement:
    • W A S D (Keyboard)
    • Left Stick (Gamepad
  • Mine ore:
    • Left-click or spacebar (Keyboard)
    • X or B (Gamepad)
Attribution
  • Pixelmix font by Andrew Tyler
  • Background music by Music_Unlimited from Pixabay
